summary: Provides ₹6000 per year in 3 equal installments to all landholding farmers’ families.
eligibility: All land-holding farmers' families except tax payers and higher officials.

summary: Offers crop insurance for farmers against loss due to natural calamities, pests, and diseases.
eligibility: All farmers growing notified crops in notified areas.

summary: Provides timely access to credit (loans) for farmers at subsidized interest rates for buying seeds, fertilizers, and other farm inputs.
eligibility: All farmers, including tenant and oral lessee farmers.

summary: Promotes irrigation efficiency and water conservation through micro-irrigation.
eligibility: All farmers including individual and group beneficiaries.

summary: Provides soil health cards to farmers with information on nutrients and fertilizers needed.

eligibility: Implemented by state departments; benefits per project rules.

summary: Online trading platform for agricultural produce, connecting farmers to buyers.
eligibility: All registered farmers and traders via APMCs.

summary: Promotes organic farming through cluster-based certification.
eligibility: Farmers practicing organic farming under group/cluster model.

scheme: National Mission on Edible Oils – Oil Palm (NMEO-OP)
summary: Boosts oil palm cultivation with financial assistance for farmers.
eligibility: Farmers engaged in oil palm cultivation.

summary: Infrastructure development fund to support agri-startups and FPOs.

eligibility: Small and marginal farmers across India.

scheme: PM Formalisation of Micro Food Processing Enterprises (PM-FME)
summary: Supports micro food processors with financial, technical, and business support.
eligibility: Individual micro food processors, SHGs, cooperatives, and FPOs.

summary: Provides insurance coverage to farmers for their cattle and livestock.
eligibility: All farmers owning cattle or livestock in notified areas.

summary: Provides insurance cover based on weather parameters instead of yield.
eligibility: Farmers cultivating notified crops in notified areas.

summary: Promotes integrated development of horticulture sector for fruits and vegetables.
eligibility: All farmers engaged in horticulture production.

summary: Assists in creating infrastructure like godowns, cold storage, etc.

eligibility: Dryland farmers in Karnataka with less than 5 hectares of land.

summary: Provides Rs. 10,000 per hectare to millet farmers for promotion of millets.
Centers that provide information, seeds, fertilizers, and other services to farmers.

eligibility: Graduates/diploma holders unemployed for over 6 months in Karnataka.

summary: Provides free milk to school children and boosts dairy farmers' income.
eligibility: School children; benefits dairy farmers indirectly.

summary: Encourages rural self-employment via financial support for village industries.
eligibility: Rural entrepreneurs and SHGs in Karnataka.

summary: Subsidies for installing solar-powered irrigation pumps for farmers.
eligibility: Farmers with grid-connected or off-grid pump sets.

summary: Promotes entrepreneurship and sustainable livestock development.
eligibility: Farmers, FPOs, SHGs, and entrepreneurs in livestock rearing.

summary: Financial and technical support for forming and operating FPOs.
eligibility: Minimum 300–500 members required depending on the region.

summary: Karnataka’s unified platform for farmer registration, DBT, and subsidy distribution.

eligibility: SC/ST farmers with no irrigation access and valid land records.

scheme: Pradhan Mantri Krishi Sinchayee Yojana - Per Drop More Crop
summary: Supports micro irrigation systems to improve water efficiency.
eligibility: All small and marginal farmers with water access.

summary: Provides farm equipment on rental basis to small/marginal farmers.
eligibility: Small/marginal farmers, FPOs, SHGs in Karnataka.

summary: Promotes cost-free farming techniques to reduce dependency on external inputs.
eligibility: Open to all farmers, especially those facing debt or cost pressure.

summary: Soil health improvement initiative using micronutrients and fertilizers.
eligibility: Karnataka farmers with soil test cards.

summary: Provides guaranteed 100 days of wage work per year to rural households.
eligibility: Any rural adult willing to do unskilled manual labor.

summary: Community-led groundwater management in water-stressed regions.
Ensures MSP for farmers via procurement and price support.
Promotes self-employment through SHGs and microcredit.

summary: Empowers women farmers with skills, inputs, and extension support.

summary: Promotes micro-irrigation like drip and sprinkler systems.

summary: Conserves and develops indigenous bovine breeds.

eligibility: Registered FPOs with minimum membership criteria.

summary: Comprehensive insurance for crops via various schemes.
1–2% interest subsidy for short-term crop loans up to a limit.

eligibility: All interested farmers; special focus on debt-ridden farmers.

summary: Provides subsidies for rural storage facilities.

scheme: Dairy Processing and Infrastructure Development Fund (DIDF)
summary: Supports dairy infrastructure and processing capacity.

scheme: Ayushman Bharat-Pradhan Mantri Jan Arogya Yojana (AB-PMJAY)

eligibility: Economically vulnerable families identified in SECC.

summary: Strengthens extension services for agriculture and allied sectors.

scheme: Deen Dayal Upadhyaya Gram Jyoti Yojana (DDUGJY)

scheme: Pradhan Mantri Fasal Samman Nidhi (Previously PM-Kisan)

summary: Supports formation and development of Farmer Producer Organizations.

summary: Enhances fish production, transport, and infrastructure.

summary: Health monitoring and medical support for farmers.
